item.title: 14 Engineering Blogs I Love
item.description: I love technical engineering blogs. I find it fascinating and incredibly educational that individuals (and organizations) are willing to share the innermost personal details of the trials and tribulations of developing technology solutions. I especially enjoy when a team is willing to publish their personal failures and the lessons learned for all to see. There’s so much we can learn from the experiences of our peers. Kilim Choi maintains an awesome (and exhaustive) list of engineering blogs in a Github repo at https://github.
